turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there. I'm trying to get a coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, like an iced latte maybe large size with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a large iced latte with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. That's it. And I would like to pick it up on Main Street in Downers Grove, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you please repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Main Street in Downers Grove, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's cafe store in main street in downer's grove.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
